comments.comments_text: The resulting set piece from D. Zagreb is comfortably intercepted by one of the defending players.

comments.comments_text: It's a goal! Josip Drmic (Din. Zagreb) does well to meet a cross inside the box and powers a header past the helpless goalkeeper.

comments.comments_text: Benoit Bastien blows his whistle and Dominik Yankov (Ludogorets) is shown a second yellow card for his foul. His manager will not be pleased. He has lot of time to think about it as he walks off.

comments.comments_text: A yellow card for bad language! Stefan Ristovski (Din. Zagreb) couldn’t remain silent and the result is obvious.

comments.comments_text: This yellow card was deserved. The tackle by Josip Misic (Din. Zagreb) was quite harsh and Benoit Bastien didn't hesitate to show him a yellow card.

comments.comments_text: GOAL! That’s a great strike from the spot by Mislav Orsic (Din. Zagreb) into the left of the net, giving goalkeeper Simon Sluga no chance!

comments.comments_text: Mislav Orsic (Din. Zagreb) makes himself some space on the edge of the penalty area and pulls the trigger. His accurate effort goes off the post into the bottom right corner. He makes it 3:0.

comments.comments_text: Goal Kiril Despodov (Ludogorets)! Kiril Despodov (Ludogorets) was put through by Igor Thiago and he showed brilliant composure inside the box to fire into the top of the net. 3:1.
